body_content.explanation:
abbreviation for
curriculum vitae formal : a short written description of your education, qualifications, previous jobs, and sometimes also your personal interests, that you send to an employer when you are trying to get a job
a written description of the previous work of someone who is looking for a job at a college or university:
examples: Applicants interested in applying for the position should submit their CVs to the Anatomy Department no later than 15 February.
